Index of /public/ftp/pub/Linux/system/admin/idle

What you'll find here: programs to display/kill idle or greedy users

You can also view this index in terse format, or return to the parent directory.

Clobberd-2.9.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-01-25
user regulator (24726 bytes)
Slay.1.2.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1996-02-07
kills all of a user's processes (1555 bytes)
autolog-0.35.tgz (LSM entry) 1998-10-21
auto logout of idle users w/config file (23822 bytes)
clobberd-4.3-1.tar.bz2 (LSM entry) 1999-01-02
User/Resource Monitor. Used to keep tabs on users (36426 bytes)
idle_watch.tar.gz (LSM entry?) 1995-08-02
reads the utmp entrys and checks for idle users (2962 bytes)
idled-1.02c.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-05-09
kicks off idle users (14629 bytes)
idled-1.12.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1995-11-19
kills idle login shells - fairly configurable (61947 bytes)
idlekiller.gz (LSM entry?) 1994-12-23
kills idle processes, not users (1130 bytes)
idleout-mcm.tar.gz (LSM entry?) 1994-10-21
Automatically logs out idle users (3383 bytes)
kidled-0.4.tar.gz (LSM entry) 1998-12-18
kick idle users off the system (9012 bytes)
